-1.title: Mediation and/or Defendant
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Students from the Advanced Diploma of Professional Screenwriting, and the Certificate IV of Screen and Media (Television Production), RMIT University (2016) have come together to create Mediation. The characters explore what happens when the local legal-aid center closes down, leaving the locals with an influx of things to argue about, and only so many ways to keep the peace.
